#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long
map<ll,ll>m;
ll a[45];
int main(){
	int n;
	ll s;
	cin>>n>>s;
	int i,j;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>a[i];
	int x=1<<(n/2);
	for(i=0;i<x;i++){
		ll sum=0;
		for(j=0;j<n/2;j++){
			if(i&(1<<j))
				sum+=a[j];
		}
		m[sum]++;
	}
	x=1<<(n-(n/2));
	ll ans=0;
	for(i=0;i<x;i++){
		ll sum=0;
		for(j=n/2;j<n;j++){
			if(i&(1<<(j-(n/2))))
				sum+=a[j];
		}
		if(s-sum>=0)
			ans+=m[s-sum];
			
	}
	cout<<ans;
	return 0;
}
